Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Traits.Name: Burning Wheel
Traits.Description: This demon's speed is 15. However, any movement this demon makes on its turn must be in the same direction and in straight lines.

Actions.Name: Agonize
Actions.Hit: [D] and character must save or become slowed.
Actions.Effect: The Wheel dashes up to 8 spaces before this attack. It deals additional damage equal to how far it traveled before it attacked.

Actions.Name: Spit Fire
Actions.AreaEffect: Fray damage and characters are burning. Burning characters instead take [D].

Actions.Name: Spin Out
Actions.Description: Adjacent foes must save or become blinded and burning.

Actions.Name: Exfoliate
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times.
Actions.Effect: An adjacent foe must save or take [D]+fray. Slow characters fail the save.
